title: Boy, 15, critical in Paterson after accidental shooting, police say
content:
TARIQ ZEHAWI / STAFF PHOTOGRAPHER
PATERSON – A 15-year-old boy was in critical condition after accidentally shooting himself in the head, police said Sunday.
The shooting occurred in the late afternoon on Fair Street, near the intersection of East 18th Street. The victim was taken to St. Joseph’s Regional Medical Center. No other information was available.
There have been 19 homicides in the city this year.
Check back for more on this developing story.
